roleset.name: cause shame

example.name: passive
example.text: Naturally, John-1 was rather abashed *-1 at the prospect of meeting a couple who had taken an interest in him and the college.
example.arg: at the prospect of meeting a couple who had taken an interest in him and the college

roleset.note: ABASH-V NOTES: Frame by Claire (from abash.01-v)
